name: The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood
name_original: The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood
description:
The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Turbine. It came out on 01-12-2009. Turbine published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood is available on PC.
